title: Native build of kafka-bare-quickstart fails with an error for disallowed Inet4Address in build time
body:
### Describe the bug

Native build of kafka-bare-quickstart fails with an error for disallowed Inet4Address in build time

```
[INFO] [io.quarkus.deployment.pkg.steps.NativeImageBuildStep] Running Quarkus native-image plugin on GraalVM 22.3.1 Java 17 CE (Java Version 17.0.6+10-jvmci-22.3-b13)

-J-Dsun.nio.ch.maxUpdateArraySize=100 -J-Dlogging.initial-configurator.min-level=500 -J-Dvertx.logger-delegate-factory-class-name=io.quarkus.vertx.core.runtime.VertxLogDelegateFactory -J-Dvertx.disableDnsResolver=true -J-Dio.netty.leakDetection.level=DISABLED -J-Dio.netty.allocator.maxOrder=3 -J-Duser.language=en -J-Duser.country=GB -J-Dfile.encoding=UTF-8 --features=io.quarkus.runner.Feature,io.quarkus.runtime.graal.DisableLoggingFeature,io.quarkus.caffeine.runtime.graal.CacheConstructorsFeature -J--add-exports=java.security.jgss/sun.security.krb5=ALL-UNNAMED -J--add-opens=java.base/java.text=ALL-UNNAMED -J--add-opens=java.base/java.io=ALL-UNNAMED -J--add-opens=java.base/java.lang.invoke=ALL-UNNAMED -J--add-opens=java.base/java.util=ALL-UNNAMED -H:+CollectImageBuildStatistics -J-Djava.awt.headless=true --no-fallback --link-at-build-time -H:+ReportExceptionStackTraces -H:-AddAllCharsets --enable-url-protocols=http -H:-UseServiceLoaderFeature -H:+StackTrace -H:AdditionalSecurityProviders=com.sun.security.sasl.Provider,org.apache.kafka.common.security.oauthbearer.internals.OAuthBearerSaslClientProvider,org.apache.kafka.common.security.scram.internals.ScramSaslClientProvider ```

### Expected behavior

Native build works

### Actual behavior

Native build fails

### How to Reproduce?

Run https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus-quickstarts/tree/development/kafka-bare-quickstart with Quarkus main

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

macOS

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "17.0.6" 2023-01-17

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

OpenJDK Runtime Environment GraalVM CE 22.3.1 (build 17.0.6+10-jvmci-22.3-b13)

### Quarkus version or git rev

main

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

_No response_
